description: Look into the error message 'Failed to parse React code generation response: Unexpected token 'H', "Here is th"... is not valid JSON'. Debug and resolve the issue to enable successful code generation.

step.title: Investigate and fix React code generation failure
step.description: Look into the error message 'Failed to parse React code generation response: Unexpected token 'H', "Here is th"... is not valid JSON'. Debug and resolve the issue to enable successful code generation.

codeRequirements.planContext: Create a simple React functional component that implements a counter with increment, decrement, and reset buttons. The counter value should be styled red when negative and green when positive using CSS modules.
